definition.name: Run Gemini CLI
definition.description: Invoke the Gemini CLI from a GitHub Action.
definition.author: Google LLC

inputs.name: gcp_service_account
inputs.description: The Google Cloud service account email.

inputs.name: gcp_workload_identity_provider
inputs.description: The Google Cloud Workload Identity Provider.

inputs.name: gcp_token_format
inputs.description: The token format for authentication. Set to "access_token" to generate access tokens (requires service account), or set to empty string for direct WIF. Can be "access_token" or "id_token".

inputs.name: gcp_access_token_scopes
inputs.description: The access token scopes when using token_format "access_token". Comma-separated list of OAuth 2.0 scopes.

inputs.name: gemini_api_key
inputs.description: The API key for the Gemini API.

inputs.name: gemini_cli_version
inputs.description: The version of the Gemini CLI to install. Can be "latest", "preview", "nightly", a specific version number, or a git branch, tag, or commit. For more information, see [Gemini CLI releases](https://github.com/google-gemini/gemini-cli/blob/main/docs/releases.md).

inputs.name: gemini_debug
inputs.description: Enable debug logging and output streaming.

inputs.name: gemini_model
inputs.description: The model to use with Gemini.

inputs.name: google_api_key
inputs.description: The Vertex AI API key to use with Gemini.

inputs.name: prompt
inputs.description: A string passed to the Gemini CLI's [`--prompt` argument](https://github.com/google-gemini/gemini-cli/blob/main/docs/cli/configuration.md#command-line-arguments).

inputs.name: settings
inputs.description:
A JSON string written to `.gemini/settings.json` to configure the CLI's _project_ settings.
For more details, see the documentation on [settings files](https://github.com/google-gemini/gemini-cli/blob/main/docs/cli/configuration.md#settings-files).

inputs.name: use_gemini_code_assist
inputs.description:
Whether to use Code Assist for Gemini model access instead of the default Gemini API key.
For more information, see the [Gemini CLI documentation](https://github.com/google-gemini/gemini-cli/blob/main/docs/cli/authentication.md).

inputs.name: use_vertex_ai
inputs.description:
Whether to use Vertex AI for Gemini model access instead of the default Gemini API key.
For more information, see the [Gemini CLI documentation](https://github.com/google-gemini/gemini-cli/blob/main/docs/cli/authentication.md).

inputs.name: extensions
inputs.description: A list of Gemini CLI extensions to install.

inputs.name: upload_artifacts
inputs.description: Whether to upload artifacts to the github action.

inputs.name: use_pnpm
inputs.description: Whether or not to use pnpm instead of npm to install gemini-cli

inputs.name: workflow_name
inputs.description: The GitHub workflow name, used for telemetry purposes.

outputs.name: summary
outputs.description: The summarized output from the Gemini CLI execution.

outputs.name: error
outputs.description: The error output from the Gemini CLI execution, if any.
